verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [V: said] [ARG1: special counsel Robert Mueller was within his rights to bring charges against the former Trump campaign chairman]
A federal judge said [ARG1: special counsel Robert Mueller] [V: was] [ARG2: within his rights to bring charges against the former Trump campaign chairman]
A federal judge said [ARG0: special counsel Robert Mueller] was within his rights to [V: bring] [ARG1: charges against the former Trump campaign chairman]
